title: Bear and Kangaroo
description: Bear and Kangaroo tells the story of two animal friends who are always trying to outdo each other. Charming illustrations show that the competition is good-natured. Repeated sentence patterns and character dialogue make this a fun book to read.
meta: catch, climb, eat, hop, juggle, lift
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast characters
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and write the high-frequency word I

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
